com.tapsterrock.mpx
Class MPXFile

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.tapsterrock.mpx.MPXFile
public class MPXFile
extends java.lang.Object

This class encapsulates all functionality relating to creating, read and writing MPX files and their constituent records.

Constructor Summary
MPXFile()
          Default constructor.
MPXFile(java.io.File file)
          This constructor is provided as a convenience to allow a source file to be specified from which the contents of the MPX file are read.
MPXFile(java.io.InputStream stream)
          This constructor is the primary mechanism for reading an existing MPX file.
MPXFile(java.lang.String path)
          This constructor is provided as a convenience to allow a source file path to be specified from which the contents of the MPX file are read.
 
Method Summary
 BaseCalendar addBaseCalendar()
          This method is used to add a new base calendar to the file.
 Comments addComments()
          Programatically add a new comment to the MPX file.
 DdeOleClientLinks addDdeOleClientLinks()
          This method is used to add new dde/ole links to the file.
 BaseCalendar addDefaultBaseCalendar()
          This is a convenience method used to add a base calendar called "Standard" to the file, and populate it with a default working week and default working hours
 ProjectHeader addProjectHeader()
          This method is used to add a project header to the file.
 ProjectNames addProjectNames()
          This method is used to add project names to the file.
 Resource addResource()
          This method is used to add a new resource to the file.
 Task addTask()
          This method allows a task to be added to the file programatically.
 boolean getAutoOutlineLevel()
          Retrieve the flag that determines whether outline level is generated automatically.
 boolean getAutoWBS()
          Retrieve the flag that determines whether WBS is generated automatically.

          Retrieves the currency settings.
 DateTimeSettings getDateTimeSettings()
          Retrieves the date and time settings.
 DefaultSettings getDefaultSettings()
          Retrieves the default settings.
 char getDelimiter()
          Accessor method to retrieve the current file delimiter character.
 FileCreationRecord getFileCreationRecord()
          Retrieves the file creation record.
 boolean getIgnoreCurrencyThousandsSeparator()
          Retrieves the flag that tells the library whether or not to ignore the thousands separator specified in the currency format.
 void setAutoOutlineLevel(boolean flag)
          Used to set whether outline level numbers are automatically created.
 void setAutoWBS(boolean flag)
          Used to set whether WBS numbers are automatically created.
 void setDelimiter(char delimiter)
          Modifier method used to set the delimiter character.
 void setIgnoreCurrencyThousandsSeparator(boolean ignore)
          Sets the flag that tells the library whether or not to ignore the thousands separator specified in the currency format.
 void write(java.io.File out)
          This is a convenience method provided to allow the contents of the MPX file to be written to a file specified by the File object passed as a parameter.
 void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
          This method writes each record in the MPX file to an output stream.

getBaseCalendar

public BaseCalendar getBaseCalendar(java.lang.String calendarName)
Retrieves the named base calendar. This method will return null if the named base calendar is not located.
Parameters:
calendarName - name of the required base calendar
Returns:
base calendar object

write

public void write(java.io.OutputStream out)
           throws java.io.IOException
This method writes each record in the MPX file to an output stream.
Parameters:
out - destination output stream
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown on failure to write to the output stream

write

public void write(java.io.File out)
           throws java.io.IOException
This is a convenience method provided to allow the contents of the MPX file to be written to a file specified by the File object passed as a parameter.
Parameters:
out - destination output file
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown on failure to write to the file
